forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High near 10C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early, becoming a steady light rain for the afternoon. High near 50F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
